Summary: my brother and i seen an object moving w/o sound and changing shapes.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy brother and i stepped out side to enjoy the weather. as i looked off my front porch i noticed a object moving over the tree line, from south to the north. the object looked like a v then as it moved through the sky it changed shapes . the thing glowed like silver and then would look transparent. this went on for about 25 seconds. then it simply vanished into thin air. the whole time we watched it, it never made a sound what so ever. this thing was huge and as it moved it would change sizes.
Object Shape: Circle, Oval, Sphere, Triangle, Other, Unknown
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bethany
This sighting has never been favorited.
